amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for the Syria Train and Equip Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 42 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funds appropriated under this act from being used to fund assistance authorized by Section 1209 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 283 (Roll no. 328).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gabbard amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 135 - 283 (Roll no. 328).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Ms. Gabbard.
